df-vdwap
blocks.content: Define the arithmetic progression function, which takes as input a length ` k ` , a start point ` a ` , and a step ` d ` and outputs the set of points in this progression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-vdwap(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cvdwa, cmpt(s0, cn0, cmpo(s1, s2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s3, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cv(s3), cmul, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-vdwap(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ AP =(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(s1 ∈ ℕ, s2 ∈ ℕ ↦ ran((s3 ∈(0[...](s0[-]1))↦(s1[+](s3[×]s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-vdwmc

blocks.name: df-vdwpc
blocks.content: Define the "contains a polychromatic collection of APs" predicate. See ~ vdwpc for more information. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-vdwpc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cvdwp, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wrex(s3, cn, wrex(s4, co(cn, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wa(wral(s5, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wss(co(co(cv(s3), caddc, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5))), cfv(cvdwa, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5))), cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), csn(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5)))))))), wceq(cfv(chash, crn(cmpt(s5, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5))))))), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: vdwapfval
blocks.content: Define the arithmetic progression function, which takes as input a length ` k ` , a start point ` a ` , and a step ` d ` and outputs the set of points in this progression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm vdwapfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(cvdwa, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cn0, cvdwa, cmpo(s0, s1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)))))), cmpo(s0, s1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)))))))
  mpt2eq3dva(s0, s1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1))))), crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)))), cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)))), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  mpteq1d(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1))), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), co(c0, cmin, nat1), w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1, c0, w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn)))
  simp1(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cn))
  df-vdwap(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mpt2ex(s0, s1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1))))))
  nnex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat0, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cfz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s2)
  diff.nat1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm vdwapfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ0 →(AP ` c0)=(s0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ ↦ ran((s2 ∈(0[...](c0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cn0, cvdwa, (s0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ ↦ ran((s2 ∈(0[...](c0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1))))), (s0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ ↦ ran((s2 ∈(0[...](hs0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1))))))
  mpt2eq3dva(s0, s1, cn, cn, ran((s2 ∈(0[...](hs0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1)))), ran((s2 ∈(0[...](c0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1)))), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((s2 ∈(0[...](hs0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1))), (s2 ∈(0[...](c0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1))), (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ))
  mpteq1d(s2, (0[...](hs0[-]1)), (s0[+](s2[×]s1)), (0[...](c0[-]1)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ))
  oveq2d(nat0, cfz, (hs0[-]1), (c0[-]1), (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ))
  oveq1d(hs0, cmin, nat1, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s1 ∈ ℕ))
  simp1(hs0 = c0, s0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ)
  df-vdwap(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mpt2ex(s0, s1, cn, cn, ran((s2 ∈(0[...](c0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1)))))
  nnex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈ ℕ ↦ ran((s2 ∈(0[...](c0[-]1))↦(s0[+](s2[×]s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat0, cfz, (hs0[-]1))
  diff.co.s(s2, hs0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, nat0, cfz, (c0[-]1))
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.cfz.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s2)
  diff.nat1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: vdwapf
blocks.content: The arithmetic progression function is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm vdwapf(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wf(cfv(cvdwa, c0), cxp(cn, cn), cpw(cn)))
} = {
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, cn0), wf(cfv(cvdwa, c0), cxp(cn, cn), cpw(cn)), wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cn, cn), cpw(cn)))
  mpbi(wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cn, cn), cpw(cn)), wral(hs0, cn, wral(hs1, cn, wcel(crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))))), cpw(cn)))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cn, wcel(crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))))), cpw(cn)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wcel(crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))))), cpw(cn)), wss(crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))))), cn))
  frnd(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cn, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  fmpttd(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))), cn, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)), cn0))
  simpll(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cv(hs2), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))))
  nn0mulcld(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wcel(cv(hs2), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs2), cn0))
  elfznn0(cv(hs2), co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cv(hs2), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0))
  nnnn0(cv(hs1))
  nnnn0addcl(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))
  elpw2(crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))))), cn)
  nnex()
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1))))), cpw(cn), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))))))
  feq1d(cfv(cvdwa, c0), cxp(cn, cn), cpw(cn), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  vdwapfval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs2.c(co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))
  diff.hs2.c(cn)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cn))
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(cn))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: vdwapval
blocks.content: Value of the arithmetic progression function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm vdwapval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wb(wcel(c3, co(c1, cfv(cvdwa, c0), c2)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wceq(c3, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl6bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cfv(cvdwa, c0), c2)), wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wceq(c3, co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))), wcel(c3, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))))))
  eleq2d(c3, co(c1, cfv(cvdwa, c0), c2), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  syl6eq(co(c1, cfv(cvdwa, c0), c2), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))), crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  eqtrd(co(c1, cfv(cvdwa, c0), c2), crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))), co(c1, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)))))), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  oveqd(c1, cfv(cvdwa, c0), c2, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)))))), w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wceq(cfv(cvdwa, c0), cmpo(hs1, hs2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2))))))))
  vdwapfval(hs1, hs2, s0, c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn), wceq(co(c1, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)))))), c2), crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))))))
  ovmpt2a(hs1, hs2, c1, cn, c2, cn, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)))))), crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))), crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2))))))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)))), cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c2)))
  mpteq2dv(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2))), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c2)))
  sylan2(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2))), co(c1, caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, c2))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)), co(cv(s0), cmul, c2)))
  oveq2(cv(hs2), c2, cv(s0), cmul)
  oveq12(cv(hs1), c1, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)), co(cv(s0), cmul, c2), caddc)
  eqid(cmpo(hs1, hs2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs2)))))))

thm vdwmc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0[MonoAP]c1, ∃(s0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ,(s1[(AP ` c0)]s2)⊆(`' c1 " { s0 })))), ∃(s0,(ran((AP ` c0))⋂ P((`' c1 " { s0 })))≠ ∅))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[MonoAP]c1 ↔ ∃(s0,(ran((AP ` c0))⋂ P((`' c1 " { s0 })))≠ ∅)), c0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancl(w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 : c2 → c3), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fex(c1, c2, c3, universe)
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, cn0, c1, universe, cvdwm, ∃(s0,(ran((AP ` c0))⋂ P((`' c1 " { s0 })))≠ ∅), ∃(s0,(ran((AP ` hs0))⋂ P((`' hs1 " { s0 })))≠ ∅))
  exbidv(s0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), (ran((AP ` hs0))⋂ P((`' hs1 " { s0 })))≠ ∅, (ran((AP ` c0))⋂ P((`' c1 " { s0 })))≠ ∅)
  neeq1d((ran((AP ` hs0))⋂ P((`' hs1 " { s0 }))), emptycls, (ran((AP ` c0))⋂ P((`' c1 " { s0 }))), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  ineqan12d(ran((AP ` hs0)), P((`' hs1 " { s0 })), ran((AP ` c0)), P((`' c1 " { s0 })), hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  rneqd((AP ` hs0), (AP ` c0), hs0 = c0)

  imaeq1d(`' hs1, { s0 }, `' c1, hs1 = c1)
  cnveq(hs1, c1)

blocks.name: vdwpc
blocks.content: The predicate " The coloring ` F ` contains a polychromatic ` M ` -tuple of AP's of length ` K ` ". A polychromatic ` M ` -tuple of AP's is a set of AP's with the same base point but different step lengths, such that each individual AP is monochromatic, but the AP's all have mutually distinct colors. (The common basepoint is not required to have the same color as any of the AP's.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: vdwlem10
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ vdw . Set up secondary induction on ` M ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)

thm vdwlem11(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s2, cfn, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, co(cv(s2), cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cvdwm, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1)))), wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cop(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), c1), cvdwp, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1))))))
  vdwlem10(s0, s1, s2, c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), c1, w0)
  rexbidva(s0, cn, w0, wral(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1))), wral(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wo(wbr(cop(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), c1), cvdwp, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidva(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cop(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), c1), cvdwp, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1))))
  syldan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wb(wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cop(co(cfv(chash, c0), caddc, nat1), c1), cvdwp, cv(s1)), wbr(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cvdwm, cv(s1)))), wf(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), c0))
  biimpa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))), wf(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), c0))

blocks.name: vdw
blocks.content: Van der Waerden's theorem. For any finite coloring ` R ` and integer ` K ` , there is an ` N ` such that every coloring function from ` 1 ... N ` to ` R ` contains a monochromatic arithmetic progression (which written out in full means that there is a color ` c ` and base, increment values ` a , d ` such that all the numbers ` a , a + d , ... , a + ( k - 1 ) d ` lie in the preimage of ` { c } ` , i.e. they are all in ` 1 ... N ` and ` f ` evaluated at each one yields ` c ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: vdwnnlem1
blocks.content: Corollary of ~ vdw , and lemma for ~ vdwnn . If ` F ` is a coloring of the integers, then there are arbitrarily long monochromatic APs in ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: vdwnnlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ vdwnn . The set of all "bad" ` k ` for the theorem is upwards-closed, because a long AP implies a short AP. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: vdwnn
blocks.content: Van der Waerden's theorem, infinitary version. For any finite coloring ` F ` of the positive integers, there is a color ` c ` that contains arbitrarily long arithmetic progressions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
